document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of squat lobsters of the world (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura-families Chirostylidae, Galatheidae and Kiwaidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of squat lobsters of the world (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura-families Chirostylidae, Galatheidae and Kiwaidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

, fig. 6 (off Three Kings Islands, New Zealand , 183 m ). —
Baba, 2005: 228
(synonymies, key).

paragraph.materialsCitation:

183 m
.

bibRefCitation.author: Turkay, M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Turkay, M. (1976) Decapoda Reptantia von der portugiesischen und marokkanischen Kuste Auswertung der Fahrten 8,9 c (1967), 19 (1970), 23 (1971) und 36 (1975) von F. S. Meteor. " Meteor " Forschungs-Ergebnisse, Reihe D, 23, 23 - 44.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Uroptychus maroccanus Türkay, 1976: 30
, figs 7, 9, 11 (coast of Morocco , 1300 m ). —
García Raso, 1996: 738
(NW Morocco , 1378 m ). —
d’Udekem d’Acoz, 1999: 159
(compilation).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality: coast of Morocco , 33º34.2´N , 9º19.8´W ,
1300 m
.

bibRefCitation.author: Baba, K.
bibRefCitation.refString: Baba, K. (2005) Deep-sea chirostylid and galatheid crustaceans (Decapoda: Anomura) from the Indo-West Pacific, with a list of species. Galathea Reports, 20, 1 - 317.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

Baba, 2005: 46
, fig. 15 ( Mauritius : Tombeau Bay and N of Port Louis , c.
238 m
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type data: holotype , male, ZMUC CRU-11128
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality: N of Port Louis , Mauritius , c.
238 m
.

bibRefCitation.author: Benedict, J. E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Benedict, J. E. (1902) Description of a new genus and forty six new species of crustaceans of the family Galatheidae with a list of the known marine species. Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington, 26, 243 - 334.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Uroptychus minutus Benedict, 1902: 296
, fig. 39 (off Trinidad , 134 m ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type data: 5 syntypes ( 1 male , 4 ovigerous females), USNM 7833
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality: off Trinidad (“Albatross” stn 2120),
134 m
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

, fig. 17 ( Queensland , 318–364 m ). —
Baba , 2005: 228
(synonymies, key).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type data: holotype , female, AM P31415
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality: Queensland , E of Southport , 27°55–58´S, 153°55´E ,
318 m
.

bibRefCitation.author: Tirmizi, N. M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Tirmizi, N. M. (1964) Crustacea: Chirostylidae (Galatheidea) The John Murray Expedition 1933 - 34, Scientific Reports, 10, 385 - 415.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Uroptychus murrayi Tirmizi, 1964: 397
, figs 14–18 (Indian Ocean (“John Murray” collection, station not known). —
Baba , 2005: 228
(synonymies, key).

subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: Indian Ocean (“John Murray” collection, station not known).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

(NE coast of Sri Lanka , 926 m ). — Alcock & McArdle, 1902 : pl. 57, figs 1, 1a (no record). —

, fig. 1 (Java Sea, 66 m ). —
Baba, 1981a: 117
, fig. 5 (Izu Shoto, Japan , 440–510 m ). —
Baba, 2005: 48
, 228, fig. 16 (synonymies, key, Kei Islands, 54–300 m ).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality: NE coast of Sri Lanka ,
926 m
.

bibRefCitation.author: Van Dam, A. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Van Dam, A. J. (1933) Die Chirostylidae der Siboga-expedition. Decapoda VIII: Galatheidea: Chirostylidae. Siboga Expeditie, 39 a 7, 1 - 46.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Uroptychus naso Van Dam, 1933: 23
, figs 35–37 (Kur Island and Taam Island, Kei Islands, 204–304 m ). —
Van Dam, 1939: 402
(Kei Islands and W coast of Kyushu, Japan , 153–363 m ). —
Van Dam, 1940: 97
(Java Sea, 68–71 m ). —
Baba, 1969a: 42
, figs 1, 2 (East China Sea and Tosa Bay, Japan , 152–330 m ). — Baba, 1988: 39 ( Moluccas off W coast of Halmahera, Sulu Archipelago, 240–439 m ). —
Wu et al. , 1998: 81
, figs 5, 12B (Taiwan). —
Baba, 2005: 49
, 228 (synonymies, key, Kei Islands and Japan , 245–268 m ).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality: Kur Island and Taam Island , Kei Islands ,
204–304 m
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Uroptychus nigricapillis Alcock, 1901: 283
, pl. 3, fig. 3 (Andaman Sea, 1224 m ). — Alcock & McArdle,

1902: pl. 56, fig. 3 (no record). — Laurie, 1926: 123 (Saya De Malha Bank, 265 m ). — Van Dam, 1933: 26 (W of Makassar, 450 m ). — Van Dam, 1940: 98 , fig. 2 (Java Sea, 66 m ). — Tirmizi, 1964: 390 , figs 4, 5 (South Arabian coast, Zanzibar , and Maldives , 914–1939 m ). — Baba, 1981a: 116 , fig. 4 (off SE Kyushu, Japan , 1125 m ). — Baba, 1988: 40 ( Flores Sea off S Sulawesi , between Siquijor and Bohol, South China Sea off SW Luzon, 717–1266 m ). — Baba, 1990: 947 ( Madagascar , 1200–2000 m ). — Komai, 2000: 351 (list). — Ahyong & Baba, 2004: 60–62 , fig. 2A–I (North West Shelf, Australia , 500 m ). — Baba, 2005: 50 , 228 (synonymies, key, off Kenya , 1551 m ).
